suite.name: Tasks

test.name: Order robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: c:\Users\hguimaraes\Documents\Robocorp\rsb-robot-order\geckodriver-1.log

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
kw.msg: Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
WebDriverException: Message: 'geckodriver' executable needs to be in PATH.

test.status: WebDriverException: Message: 'geckodriver' executable needs to be in PATH.

suite.doc: Orders robots from RobotSpareBin Industries Inc. Saves the order HTML receipt as a PDF file. Saves the screenshot of the ordered robot. Embeds the screenshot of the robot to the PDF receipt. Creates ZIP archive of the receipts and the images.
